head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Three Men Stabbed In Fight

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Three Men Stabbed In Fight

block.p: Three men were stabbed, one of whom was critically injured, in a fight in Astoria early yesterday, the police said. The men, whom the police did not identify, were arguing with another group near Club Fashion, on Steinway Street, about 3 a.m. when someone in the other group stabbed them, the police said. One man, who was stabbed in the neck and chest, was in critical condition at Elmhurst Hospital Center, the police said. The other two men suffered minor cuts. No arrests had been made.
